title: Hunters Border; Am I missing something?
body:
I have no Idea how to use the Hunters border icon I got from the missions loot. I tried playing with the Final Hunt icon but my border is still normal, even for my premades. Is there something I'm missing?

Any help will be rewarded with a cookie!{{item:2010}}

replies.body: There's more info on the [announcement page](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/learn-more-project-hunters-event), but the icon doesn't have an impact on making the border appear.  The borders are automatically unlocked, but they are specific to the newer project skins, not just any champ or skin.  The border will appear on  PROJECT: Vayne, PROJECT: Vi, and PROJECT: Jhin only.  If you don't have the skin now, it's okay, their borders will be ready should you unlock one in the future!
